summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 22 December to end of Wednesday 22 December GMT
description: Cloudy and feeling cold on Wednesday.<br/><br/>An easterly air feed is forecast early on, which will have passed at low altitude over urban and industrial areas on the continent. This will result in an increase in particulate concentrations in Greater London as imported pollution mixes with local emissions.<br/><br/>However, a gradual change in the path of the incoming air is then forecast later in the day and this will reduce levels of imported particulates. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
